short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blazing fast, feature-rich, secure, beautiful extension Typhon Wallet for Cardano.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Typhon Wallet extension for Cardano, with dApp connector support


- Warp Transactions
- Pending and Instant Transactions
- Ada Handle support
- Multi Recipient support
- Hardware wallet support
- Staking
- Contacts
- Catalyst Voting Registration
- Transaction Metadata
- Native Tokens
- Multi Delegation
- Multi Wallet & Multi Account
- NFT Gallery
and more!
